name: Carpenter's Hammer, fibreglass
description: Handy hammer with fibreglass shaft and curved claw. The curved claw is gentle when pulling nails, with minimised risk of impacting the underlying material, which makes the hammer ideal for fine carpentry and lighter finishing work indoors.

name: Circular Saw CS 185
description: With laser showing the saw line and quick cutting depth setting.

name: Hand saw, 22"/R7
description: Dovetail saw with hardened, straight teeth, ergonomic two-component handle, with angles for marking 45° and 90°, and blade with anti-friction and anti-corrosion coating. The saw is designed for coarse cutting dry wood across the grain. The tooth pattern enables high cutting efficiency and cuts on both the pull stroke and push stroke.

name: Slotted screwdriver SL6 x 100 mm
description: Slotted screwdriver of very high quality. The slightly cross-shaped 2-component handle with synthetic rubber grooves greatly increases grip strength and ensures a steady hand at high torques. The hexagonal shaft provides additional options for increasing screwing force using a spanner. The shaft and tip are highly durable and forged in the same material as high-quality steel bits.

name: Phillips screwdriver PH2 x 100 mm
description: Phillips (PH) screwdriver of very high quality. The slightly cross-shaped 2-component handle with synthetic rubber grooves greatly increases grip strength and ensures a steady hand at high torques. The hexagonal shaft provides additional options for increasing screwing force using a spanner. The shaft and tip are highly durable and forged in the same material as high-quality steel bits.

name: Spirit level
description: Spirit level with three vials for horizontal, vertical, and 45º levelling. Metal contact surfaces, one with V strip and one magnetic. The design of the spirit level provides enables all-round reading.

name: Digital multimeter
description: Compact all-round multimeter with retractable stand, LCD display and protection against high voltages and currents.  The instrument measures DC and AC voltage, DC, and resistance in five different measurement ranges, and tests LEDs, connections, and 1.5 and 9 V batteries.

name: Woodworking chisel, 22 mm
description: Woodworking chisel with full-length hardened blade. With strike cap and a ergonomic two-component handle. Edge guard included.

name: Combination pliers, 200 mm
description: Combination pliers with side cutters, pipe grip, cross-grooved jaws, and comfortable, ergonomic two-piece handle. In corrosion-resistant, fully chromed design.

name: Spirit level 1200mm
description: Heavy-duty spirit level with rectangular frame and three vials for horizontal, vertical, 45° levelling. With milled contact surface and impact-resistant rubber end caps.

name: Trowel
description: Masonry tool with ‘Norwegian’ cut, lacquered wooden handle, swan neck, and grinded blade. The swan neck shifts the centre of mass backwards, which makes it more ergonomic and allows the trowel to be easily hung on the edge of a mixing tub. Perfect for laying bricks and blocks.

name: Notched trowel
description: Tiling tool with double attachment and lacquered wooden handle that stiffens the blade.

name: Exterior Paintbrush PRO, straight
description: With synthetic bristles. Suitable for painting exteriors, fences and roofs. For all types of paint. With straight handle, excellent absorption, good coverage, good precision and stainless steel ferrule.

name: Utility knife, 18 mm
description: Utility knife with rubberised grip, 5 spare blades, and automatic reloading. Retractable, lockable blade.

name: All-purpose knife
description: All-purpose knife with robust metal housing. Retractable, lockable blade.

name: Putty Flexible 100mm
description: Stainless steel trowel with two-component handle, in the dimension 100 mm.

name: Set square, 250 mm
description: Classic try square with millimetre graduation.

name: Angle hook steel ruler X151
description: Measure right angles quickly and safely with a sturdy angle hook made of solid steel. This measuring tool in the form of an L-shaped steel ruler is an indispensable tool when you need to lay out pattern pieces or measure them out on your leather and skins.

name: Safety helmet
description: Lightweight and strong plastic safety helmet. Adjustable six-point fittings with wide support straps. Good ventilation. Protects against knocks, moisture, and risks associated with low electrical voltages. Withstands temperatures between -30 °C to +50 °C. Weight: 350 g. (EU) 2016/425. EN 397+A1:2013.

name: Needle-nose pliers, straight
description: Needle-nose pliers with side cutters, pipe grip, cross-grooved jaws, and comfortable, ergonomic two-piece handle. In corrosion-resistant, fully chromed design.

name: Side-cutting pliers, 160 mm
description: Side-cutting pliers with a comfortable, ergonomic two-piece handle. With corrosion-resistant, fully chromed design.

name: Combination spanner
description: Spanner with flat shaft and thin, conical U-head.

name: Adjustable spanner, 10"
description: Fully forged, black-phosphate adjustable spanner with grinded jaws and millimetre scale for quick and precise adjustment.

name: Steel tape measure, 3 m
description: Steel tape measure with auto-stop, self-retraction, wrist strap and belt clip. Nylon-coated steel tape with both millimetre and inch graduation. Ergonomic housing with rubberised details.

name: Snips, straight
description: Compound-action snips for greater cutting force and spring-loaded handles with latch. The snips have hardened blades with fine serration to prevent the sheet metal from slipping. Colour coded according to industry standard.

name: Grout Gun
description: Varispeed. For sealant compound and glue in cartridges.

name: Rectangular file, double-cut
description: Double-cut, rectangular file with medium cut and ergonomic two-component handle.

name: Flat file, single-cut
description: Single-cut flat file with medium cut and ergonomic two-component handle.

name: Rasp file
description: Double-cut, halfround/rasp file with medium cut and ergonomic two-component handle.

name: Cutting & Mitre Saw MS 210C
description: Robust machine for cutting strips, boards and planks. Equipped with pull-saw function, laser and depth-stop for groove cutting, and quick modes for mitring angles. Supplied with table widening kit, clamp, dust bag and saw blade.

name: Table Saw 1800W
description: For cutting wood. With stand, side table, carbide blade, push block, rip fence, mitre fence, adjustment tools, overload protection and vacuum cleaner connection.

name: Wheel impact wrench
description: Lightweight, very powerful nut driver. For fitting/removal of wheel bolts/nuts. Rubber-clad handle for optimal comfort. Easy to change rotational direction (right/left) with the switch. 4 impact sockets supplied (17, 19, 21 and 22 mm). Comes in a plastic storage bag.

name: Cordless drill 12V
description: Flexible cordless drill and screwdriver with built in LED-light and removable 12V Li-Ion battery. Keyless chuck  0,8-10mm. Left and right drive.

name: Hammer Drill 1200 SDS +
description: For impact drilling, drilling and chiselling. 3 drill bits and 2 chisels included. Tool socket SDS +.

name: Multi-tool MFT 180
description: Perfect for precision work on smaller surfaces and in corners! Oscillating tool with several areas of use. Supplied with a scraper, saw blade and sanding disc with 3 sanding roundels with velcro fastening.

name: Drill and Screwdriver HDB 18V
description:
Robust screwdriver with brushless motor, metal chuck and impact function. Stepless speed. Forwards/backwards. LED light. Belt hook.



NOTE! Battery and charger sold separately. Part of the MultiX 18 V series with common 18 V battery (Li-ion).

name: Jigsaw JS 18 V
description:
Stable jigsaw with parallel guide and multi-angle base in cast aluminium. With blade quick-clamp, rubber-clad handle, and LED light. The blade has 4-step adjustable pendulum motion. For sawing in wood, plastic and metal. Supplied with one wood saw blade.



NOTE! Battery and charger sold separately.

name: Angle Grinder AG 125P2
description: Compact and powerful with a motor that produces a full 1100 W. Low gear housing of metal. Adjustable spark guard and electronic stop function which activates when the carbon brush becomes worn. Max. disc size: Ø 125 x 6 mm Spindle lock for easy tool changing. Comes with a support handle and pin key.

name: Angle Grinder 180C
description: Powerful model, equipped with adjustable rear handle, spindle lock and quick-locking spark guard.
